VUPShionMod:InvestigationFinFunnel.NAME: Scouting Funnel
DESCRIPTION: Current Upgrade: #b%d. NL At the start of each turn, deal #b%d damage to a random enemy and trigger its passive ability. NL #yPassive: Apply #b%d #yBleeding.

VUPShionMod:GravityFinFunnel.NAME: Gravity Funnel
DESCRIPTION: Current Upgrade: #b%d. NL At the start of each turn, deal #b%d damage to a random enemy and trigger its passive ability. NL #yPassive: Grant #b%d #yBlock.

VUPShionMod:PursuitFinFunnel.NAME: Pursuing Funnel
DESCRIPTION: Current Upgrade: #b%d. NL At the start of each turn, deal #b%d Damage to a random enemy and trigger its passive ability. NL #yPassive: Apply #b%d #yPursued.
